AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_GLB_RCS_PFC_EN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping configuration of CGM global resources indication to PFC bitmap

Field.Description: PFC enable.
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_GLB_RCS_OOB_EN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping configuration of CGM global resources indication to OOB bitmap

Field.Description: OOB enable.
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_GLB_RCS_LLFC_EN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: High-priority global resource to NIF LLFC mapping.

Field.Description: LLFC enable.
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_CAT2_PFC_EN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping configuration of category2 and TC VSQs to 384 PFC bitmap presented to the NIF.

Field.Description: PFC enable.
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_CAT2_OOB_EN
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping configuration of category2 and TC VSQs to 512 OOB bitmap presented to the NIF.

Field.Description: PFC enable.
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_REC_PFC_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Maping NIF PFC signal to EGQ PFC signal.

Field.Description: MAP_SEL is 1'b0: Index to 1 of 512 EGQ PFC; MAP_SEL is 1'b1: Index to 1 of 16 generifc PFC bitmaps.
Field.Name: MAP_VAL

Field.Description: Select between the following: 1'b0: PFC; 1'b1: Generic PFC bitmap.
Field.Name: MAP_SEL

Field.Description: Entry valid bit. If unset, PFC index is masked.
Field.Name: MAP_VALID

AppDB.Name: FC_REC_VSQ_RCY_TO_PFC_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping 32 recycle VSQ to Qpair/port and general purpose bitmap

Field.Description: MAP_SEL is 3'b000: - Index to 1 of 512 EGQ PFC; MAP_SEL is 3`b001/3'b010/3'd011: - Port starting index; MAP_SEL is 3'b100: - Index to 1 of 32 generifc PFC bitmaps.
Field.Name: MAP_VAL

Field.Description: Select between the following: 3'b000: PFC 3'b001: Port (2 priority) 3'b010: Port (4 priority) 3'b011: Port (8 priority) 3'b100: Generic PFC bitmap.
Field.Name: MAP_SEL

Field.Description: Entry valid bit. If unset, VSQ index is masked.
Field.Name: MAP_VALID

AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_VSQD_PFC_LLFC_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping VSQ D to Qpair/port in order to generate PFC/LLFC

Field.Description: Destination index (LLFC / PFC ) According to Select bit
Field.Name: INDEX

Field.Description: Select between the following: 1'b0 - LLFC , 1'b1 - PFC
Field.Name: SELECT

Field.Description: Entry valid bit. If unset, VSQ index is masked
Field.Name: VALID

AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_INB_ILKN_CAL_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping of the Inband ILKN TX calendar channels to the possible generated FC indications.

Field.Description: The index to one of the generated FC indications that should be mapped to current calendar channel.
Field.Name: FC_INDEX

Field.Description: The type of FC that the FC_INDEX refers to.
Field.Name: FC_SRC_SEL

AppDB.Name: FC_REC_INB_ILKN_CAL_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping of the Inband ILKN RX received FC status frames

Field.Description: The index to one of the destinations FC indications that should be mapped from the current calendar channel.
Field.Name: MAP_VAL

Field.Description: Defines the type of FC that MAP_VAL refers to
Field.Name: DEST_SEL

AppDB.Name: FC_GEN_OOB_CAL_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping of the SPI/HCFC/ILKN-OOB-TX calendar channels to the possible generated FC indications.

Field.Description: The index to one of the generated FC indications that should be mapped to current calendar channel.
Field.Name: FC_INDEX

Field.Description: The type of FC that the FC_INDEX refers to.
Field.Name: FC_SRC_SEL

AppDB.Name: FC_REC_OOB_CAL_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping of the OOB-RX received FC status frames

Field.Description: The index to one of the destinations FC indications that should be mapped from the current calendar channel.
Field.Name: MAP_VAL

Field.Description: Defines the type of FC that MAP_VAL refers to
Field.Name: DEST_SEL

AppDB.Name: FC_REC_COE_CAL_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping of the PP-RX received FC status frames

Field.Description: The index to one of the destinations FC indications that should be mapped from the current calendar channel.
Field.Name: MAP_VAL

Field.Description: Defines the type of FC that MAP_VAL refers to
Field.Name: DEST_SEL

AppDB.Name: FC_RX_CPU_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CMIC RX flow control mapping to PFC (CMIC to EGQ).

Field.Description: Q-pair mapped to the specified CPU channel.
Field.Name: QPAIR

AppDB.Name: FC_RX_CPU_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CMIC RX flow control Mask (CMIC to EGQ) of generated CMIC vector..

Field.Description: Enable reception of flow control for the specified CPU channel.
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_GENERIC_BITMAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Generic PFC mapping bitmaps. Shared by different sources for generating more than one PFC flow control presented to the EGQ.

Field.Description: Q-pair mapped to the specified CPU channel.
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_GLB_RSC_MASKS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Global resource masking.

Field.Description: Global resource masking bit 0 - LP mask, bit 1 - HP mask
Field.Name: DRAM_ENABLE

Field.Description: Global resource masking bit 0 - LP mask, bit 1 - HP mask
Field.Name: SRAM_ENABLE

Field.Description: Global resource masking bit 0 - LP mask, bit 1 - HP mask
Field.Name: DRAM_POOL_0_ENABLE

Field.Description: Global resource masking bit 0 - LP mask, bit 1 - HP mask
Field.Name: DRAM_POOL_1_ENABLE

Field.Description: Global resource masking bit 0 - LP mask, bit 1 - HP mask
Field.Name: SRAM_POOL_0_ENABLE

Field.Description: Global resource masking bit 0 - LP mask, bit 1 - HP mask
Field.Name: SRAM_POOL_1_ENABLE

Field.Description: Global resource masking bit 0 - LP mask, bit 1 - HP mask
Field.Name: HDRM_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_CAT2_TC_MAP_PFC_ENA
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Enable mapping configuration of category2 and TC VSQs to a 512b configured PFC bitmap sent to the NIF. - VSQs 16-23.

Field.Description: Enable mapping configuration mapping of connection class of category2 and TC VSQs to a 512b configured PFC bitmap sent to the NIF,
Field.Name: ENABLE

AppDB.Name: FC_INB_ILKN_PARAMETERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Parameters for Inband ILKN TX calendar

Field.Description: Inband ILKN TX calendar length minus 1
Field.Name: TX_CAL_LEN

AppDB.Name: FC_OOB_PARAMETERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Parameters to configure OOB flow control.

Field.Description: Out-Of-Band PAD Configuration for ILKN and SPI4 - Resets OOB-RX interface 0
Field.Name: OOB_RX_RSTN

Field.Description: Out-Of-Band PAD Configuration for ILKN and SPI4 - Resets OOB-TX interface 0
Field.Name: OOB_TX_RSTN

Field.Description: Out-Of-Band PAD Configuration for ILKN and SPI4 - Selects between ILKN and SPI4 on OOB-RX interface 0
Field.Name: OOB_RX_MODE

Field.Description: Out-Of-Band PAD Configuration for ILKN and SPI4 - Selects between ILKN and SPI4 on OOB-TX interface 0
Field.Name: OOB_TX_MODE

Field.Description: Set out frequency of OOB-TX interface 0.
Field.Name: OOB_TX_OUT_SPEED

Field.Description: Out-Of-Band PAD Configuration for ILKN and SPI4 - Defines number of shifts in 1/2 core clock of TX_CLK.
Field.Name: OOB_TX_OUT_PHASE

Field.Description: Defines interface 0 Transmit Stat clock edge core clock shifting in addition to the settings in OobTx0OutPhase.
Field.Name: OOB_TX_OUT_ROUGH_PHASE

Field.Description: ILKN-OOB-TX-0 Flow-Control is enable.
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_TX_EN

Field.Description: ILKN-TX-0 TX calendar length minus 1 Note: settings for OOB flow control.
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_TX_CAL_LEN

Field.Description: If set, ILKN-OOB-RX-0 Flow-Control is enabled
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_RX_EN

Field.Description: ILKN-RX-0 calendar length minus 1 Notes: * Affects only on OOB flow control * Can be updated only when OobRx0Rstn is negated.
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_RX_CAL_LEN

Field.Description: Out-Of-Band PAD Configuration for ILKN - Resets OOB-RX interface 0
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_RX_RSTN

Field.Description: Out-Of-Band PAD Configuration for ILKN - Resets OOB-TX interface 0
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_TX_RSTN

Field.Description: Set polarity for ILKN-OOB FC indications of ILKN-RX-0. If unset than FC indications match Interlaken definition, otherwise FC indications are inverted
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_RX_FC_POLARITY

Field.Description: Set polarity for ILKN-OOB FC indications of ILKN-TX-0. If unset than FC indications match Interlaken definition, otherwise FC indications are inverted
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_TX_FC_POLARITY

Field.Description: Invert polarity for received ILKN-OOB FC indications.
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_RX_FC_POLARITY_INVERT

Field.Description: Invert polarity for transmited ILKN-OOB FC indications.
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_TX_FC_POLARITY_INVERT

Field.Description: Enable SPI-OOB-TX-0.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_TX_EN

Field.Description: Status transmit (OOB) calendar length. Defines the number of SPI-OOB-TX-0 channels in a single calendar.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_TX_CAL_LEN

Field.Description: Status transmit (SPI-OOB-TX-0) calendar-M. The number of calendar repetitions within a status frame.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_TX_CAL_M

Field.Description: Set polarity for SPI4-OOB FC indications of interface 0. If unset than FC indications match SPI4 definition, otherwise FC indications are inverted.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_POLARITY

Field.Description: Enable SPI4 Out-Of-Band flow-control receive on OOB-RX interface 0
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_RX_EN

Field.Description: Status SPI-OOB-RX-0 calendar length. Defines the number of channels in a single calendar.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_RX_CAL_LEN

Field.Description: Status SPI-OOB-RX-0 calendar-M. The number of calendar repetitions within a status frame.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_RX_CAL_M

AppDB.Name: FC_COE_PARAMETERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Parameters to configure COE flow control.

Field.Description: Enable PP inband FC (both modes)
Field.Name: PP_INB_ENB

Field.Description: 0' - Pause, '1' - PFC
Field.Name: PP_COE_MODE

Field.Description: N-1 - where N number of clocks for pause counters decrement
Field.Name: PP_COE_TICK_MHZ

Field.Description: Offset in bytes from start of packet for VID 8b lsb
Field.Name: COE_VID_OFFSET

Field.Description: mask used after right shift
Field.Name: COE_VID_MASK

Field.Description: coe vid to right shift
Field.Name: COE_VID_SHIFT_RIGHT

Field.Description: Offset in bytes from after Ethernet Frame for CoE FC 64b data
Field.Name: COE_DATA_OFFSET

Field.Description: MAC that identifies COE
Field.Name: COE_MAC_ADDRESS

Field.Description: EtherType that identifies COE
Field.Name: COE_ETHER_TYPE

Field.Description: ControlOpcode that identifies COE
Field.Name: COE_CONTROL_OPCODE

Field.Description: If set, COE Flow-Control is enabled
Field.Name: COE_RX_EN

Field.Description: COE calendar length minus 1.
Field.Name: COE_RX_CAL_LEN

AppDB.Name: FC_COE_VID_CHANNEL_ID_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CoE Map VID to Channel ID

Field.Description: Channel-ID to access CFC.
Field.Name: COE_CHANNEL_ID

AppDB.Name: FC_CFC_ENABLERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CFC Enable bits.

Field.Description: CFC disabled prevents flow-control (present X-On) indications to all destinations. Note: In this state, the CFC does not present them to the destinations and mask all incoming flow control
Field.Name: CFC_EN

Field.Description: If High-Priority global resource flow control indication is received by the Cgm (STE), CFC will generate flow control to the EGQ according to GlbRscCgm0/1Map
Field.Name: GLB_RSC_TO_RCL_PFC_HP_CFG

Field.Description: If Low-Priority global resource flow control indication is received by the Cgm (STE), CFC will generate flow control to the EGQ according to GlbRscCgm0/1Map
Field.Name: GLB_RSC_TO_RCL_PFC_LP_CFG

Field.Description: If set, enables flow control generation to the recycle PFCs in the EGQ by the high and low global resource flow control.
Field.Name: GLB_RSC_TO_EGQ_RCL_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables port flow control generation through the SPI-OOB-RX using the 256 PFC.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_RX_TO_EGQ_PORT_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables PFC generation through the SPI-OOB-RX.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_RX_TO_EGQ_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables mapping SPI-OOB calendar entry to one of the generic PFC through the SPI-OOB-RX.
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_RX_TO_GEN_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables port flow control generation through the ILKN-OOB-RX using the 256 PFC.
Field.Name: ILKN_RX_TO_EGQ_PORT_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables PFC generation through the ILKN-OOB-RX.
Field.Name: ILKN_RX_TO_EGQ_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables mapping ILKN calendar entry to one of the generic PFC through the ILKN-RX.
Field.Name: ILKN_RX_TO_GEN_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables fast link-level FC received from ILKN and forwarded to NIF (stops NIF Tx).
Field.Name: ILKN_RX_TO_NIF_FAST_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables port flow control generation through the ILKN-OOB-RX using the 256 PFC.
Field.Name: PP_ILKN_RX_TO_EGQ_PORT_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables PFC generation through the ILKN-OOB-RX
Field.Name: PP_ILKN_RX_TO_EGQ_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables mapping ILKN calendar entry to one of the generic PFC through the ILKN-RX
Field.Name: PP_ILKN_RX_TO_GEN_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables fast link-level FC received from ILKN and forwarded to NIF (stops NIF Tx)
Field.Name: PP_ILKN_RX_TO_NIF_FAST_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, link-level NIF's FCs will be asserted when High-priority global resource FC is asserted
Field.Name: GLB_RSC_TO_NIF_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, NIF's PFCs will be asserted when High-priority global resource FC is asserted
Field.Name: GLB_RSC_TO_NIF_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables the VSQ assigned to the link level flow control to be presented to the NIF
Field.Name: LLFC_VSQ_TO_NIF_EN

Field.Description: Con If set, enables the VSQ assigned to the PFC flow control to be presented to the NIF
Field.Name: PFC_VSQ_TO_NIF_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables fast link-level FC received from SPI OOB and forwarded to NIF (stops NIF Tx)
Field.Name: SPI_OOB_RX_TO_NIF_FAST_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables the PP VSQ assigned to the link level flow control to be presented to the NIF
Field.Name: LLFC_PP_VSQ_TO_NIF_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables the PP VSQ assigned to the PFC flow control to be presented to the NIF
Field.Name: PFC_PP_VSQ_TO_NIF_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2nif calendar llfc_stop.
Field.Name: NIF_TX_LLFC_STOP_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2nif calander gen_llfc.
Field.Name: NIF_TX_GEN_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2nif calander gen_pfc.
Field.Name: NIF_CHAIN_TX_GEN_PFC_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2nif calander gen_pfc.
Field.Name: EGQ_TX_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables fast link-level FC received from ILKN OOB and forwarded to NIF.
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_RX_TO_NIF_FAST_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2nif calendar llfc_stop.
Field.Name: NIF_FLEXE_TX_LLFC_STOP_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2nif calander gen_llfc.
Field.Name: NIF_FLEXE_TX_GEN_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2nif calander gen_pfc, bit0 -chain0, bit1- chain1.
Field.Name: NIF_FLEXE_TX_GEN_PFC_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2ilu calendar llfc_stop.
Field.Name: NIF_ILU_TX_LLFC_STOP_EN

Field.Description: Enable the cfc2ilu calander gen_llfc.
Field.Name: NIF_ILU_TX_GEN_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, NIF2CFC ETH ports LLFC interface enabled.
Field.Name: NIF_ETH_RX_LLFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, NIF2CFC ETH ports PFC interface enabled.
Field.Name: NIF_ETH_RX_PFC_EN

Field.Description: EIf set, CGM2CFC VSQ's FC interface is enabled. Bit 0 - VSQA , Bit 1 - VSQB ,... ,Bit 6 - VSQF.
Field.Name: CGM_VSQS_RX_EN

AppDB.Name: FC_CFC_ILKN_INBAND_ENABLERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CFC Enable bits.

Field.Description: If set, enables Port based PFC generation through the ILKN-Inband-RX.
Field.Name: RX_TO_EGQ_PORT_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables Single based PFC generation through the ILKN-Inband-RX
Field.Name: RX_TO_EGQ_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables Generic Bitmap based PFC generation through the ILKN-Inband-RX.
Field.Name: RX_TO_GEN_PFC_EN

Field.Description: If set, ILKN-INB-RX-3 Flow-Control is enabled.
Field.Name: RX_EN

Field.Description: If set, ILKN-INB-TX-3 Flow-Control is enabled.
Field.Name: TX_EN

Field.Description: If set, enables fast link-level FC received from ILKN and forwarded to NIF (stops NIF Tx).
Field.Name: RX_TO_NIF_FAST_LLFC_EN

AppDB.Name: FC_CGM_2_ILKN_OR_FLEXE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Choose between ILKN Inband and FlexE for the CGM propogation from GlbRsc and VSQ's.

Field.Description: Mapping of CGM propogation from GlbRsc and VSQ's is to ILKN Inbannd
Field.Name: IS_ILKN_INB

AppDB.Name: FC_GLB_RCS_TOTAL_THS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Global HP and LP flow control based on total free recourse (DRAM, SRAM).

Field.Description: Free DRAM-BDBs set threshold.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: DRAM_BDBS_TOTAL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free DRAM-BDBs clear threshold.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: DRAM_BDBS_TOTAL_TH_CLR

Field.Description: Free SRAM-Buffers set threshold.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_BUFFERS_TOTAL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free SRAM-Buffers clear threshold.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_BUFFERS_TOTAL_TH_CLR

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDBs set threshold.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_PDBS_TOTAL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDBs clear threshold.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_PDBS_TOTAL_TH_CLR

AppDB.Name: FC_GLB_RCS_PER_POOL_THS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Global flow control based on free recourse in pool (DRAM, SRAM).

Field.Description: Free DRAM-Words set threshold for specified pool.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: DRAM_WORDS_PER_POOL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free DRAM-Words clear threshold for specified pool.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: DRAM_WORDS_PER_POOL_TH_CLR

Field.Description: Free SRAM-Buffers set threshold for specified pool.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_BUFFERS_PER_POOL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free SRAM-Buffers clear threshold for specified pool.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_BUFFERS_PER_POOL_TH_CLR

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDs set threshold for specified pool.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_PDS_PER_POOL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDs clear threshold for specified pool.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: SRAM_PDS_PER_POOL_TH_CLR

AppDB.Name: FC_GLB_RCS_HDRM_THS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Global flow control based on total free recourse (HDRM).

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDs Headroom Buffers set threshold.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: HDRM_BUFFERS_TOTAL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDs Headroom Buffers clear threshold.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: HDRM_BUFFERS_TOTAL_TH_CLR

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDs Headroom PDBs set threshold.Flow control will be set when free resources are lower than configured threshold.
Field.Name: HDRM_PDS_TOTAL_TH_SET

Field.Description: Free SRAM-PDs Headroom PDBs clear threshold.Flow control will be cleared when free resources are higher than configured threshold.
Field.Name: HDRM_PDS_TOTAL_TH_CLR

AppDB.Name: FC_STATUS_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For different types of flow control, selact the indications to be presented by the status registers and get the status of the received Flow control indications.

Field.Description: Select 64 of the EGQ PFC statuses to be presented.
Field.Name: PFC_STATUS_SEL

Field.Description: Select 64 of the NIF PFC statuses to be presented.
Field.Name: PFC_GEN_STATUS_SEL

Field.Description: Select 64 of NIF PFC statuses received by the NIF to be presented.
Field.Name: NIF_PFC_STATUS_SEL

Field.Description: Select the flow control indications to be presented out of the VSQ groups A - D. Received flow controls (Status).
Field.Name: VSQ_ABCD_STATUS_SEL

Field.Description: Select the flow control indications to be presented out of the VSQ group E (LLFC). Received flow controls (Status).
Field.Name: VSQ_LLFC_STATUS_SEL

Field.Description: Select the flow control indications to be presented out of the VSQ group F (PFC). Received flow controls (Status).
Field.Name: VSQ_PFC_STATUS_SEL

AppDB.Name: FC_OOB_STATUS_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For different types of flow control, selact the indications to be presented by the status registers and get the status of the received Flow control indications.

Field.Description: Select 64 of PFC statuses (per core) received by SPI-OOB-RX-0 to be presented.
Field.Name: OOB_RX_PFC_SEL

Field.Description: Select between all PFC statuses received sources by SPI-OOB-RX-0 to be presented: 1'b0 - PFC based 1'b1 - Port based.
Field.Name: OOB_RX_PFC_SRC_SEL

AppDB.Name: FC_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For Non-OOB flow control, get the status of the received Flow control indications.

Field.Description: Present Almost full status indications received by the NIF interface.
Field.Name: AF_NIF_STATUS

Field.Description: Present FC status indications received by the NIF interface in order to transmit LLFC.
Field.Name: NIF_TX_LLFC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present FC status indications received by the NIF interface in order to stop PM.
Field.Name: NIF_STOP_STATUS

Field.Description: Present PFC based flow control status indications. 64 bits are selected by PFC_STATUS_SEL
Field.Name: PFC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present PFC based flow control status indications sent to the NIF in order to gransmit PFC. 64 bits are selected by PFC_GEN_STATUS_SEL
Field.Name: PFC_GEN_STATUS

Field.Description: Present PFC based flow control status indications received from the NIF interface to CFC. 64 bits are selected by NIF_PFC_STATUS_SEL
Field.Name: NIF_PFC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present 64 of the 712 VSQs flow controls generated by the Cgm-VSQ (STE). 64 bits are selected by VSQ_ABCD_STATUS_SEL
Field.Name: VSQ_ABCD_STATUS

Field.Description: Present 32 of the 52 link level VSQs flow controls generated by Cgm-VSQ (STE). 32 bits are selected by VSQ_LLFC_STATUS_SEL
Field.Name: VSQ_LLFC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present 64 of the 384 PFC VSQs flow controls generated by the Cgm-VSQ (STE). 64 bits are selected by VSQ_PFC_STATUS_SEL
Field.Name: VSQ_PFC_STATUS

AppDB.Name: FC_GLB_RSC_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For different types of flow control, selact the indications to be presented by the status registers and get the status of the received Flow control indications.

Field.Description: Present Flow Control indications generated by the Global resources..
Field.Name: STATUS

AppDB.Name: FC_OOB_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: For different OOB flow control, get the status of the received Flow control indications.

Field.Description: Present PFC based flow control status indications received by SPI-OOB-RX-0. 64 bits are selected by OOB_RX_PFC_SEL
Field.Name: OOB_RX_PFC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present Link level FC based flow control status indications received by SPI-OOB-RX-0.
Field.Name: OOB_RX_LLFC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present Generic PFC bitmap index indications received by SPI-OOB-RX-0.
Field.Name: OOB_RX_GEN_PFC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present OOB Flow control status indications received by ILKN-OOB-RX-0. Count according settings of ILKN-RX-0 CFC_ILKN_RX_CONFIGURATION
Field.Name: ILKN_OOB_RX_FC_STATUS

Field.Description: Present InB Flow control status indications received by ILKN-INB-RX-3 Count according settings of ILKN-RX-3 CFC_ILKN_RX_CONFIGURATION
Field.Name: ILKN_PP_RX_FC_STATUS

AppDB.Name: FC_ILKN_INB_RX_FC_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Inband ILKN FC indications received by the CFC.

Field.Description: Present Inband ILKN FC indications received by the CFC.
Field.Name: RX_STATUS

AppDB.Name: FC_NIF_ILU_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: NIF ILU FC indications related to non-calendar FC.

Field.Description: Present ILU Almost full indication received by the CFC.
Field.Name: RX_LLFC

Field.Description: Present indication sent by the CFC to ILU in order to transmit LLFC.
Field.Name: TX_LLFC_GEN

Field.Description: Present indication sent by the CFC to ILU in order to stop PM.
Field.Name: TX_LLFC_STOP
